music.title: Baye Fall Chant unplugged
music.content: This is a recording of Baye Fall chanting recorded in Diourbel, Senegal on July 22, 2011. The Baye Falls are a sub-sect of the Mouride Islamic Brotherhood. This was recorded outside the compound of a Peace Corps Volunteer serving in Senegal.

metadata.title: Baye Fall Chant unplugged

music.title: Remain In Light
music.content: The Mixtapes Takes You On A Travel To Tribes, Voodoo Samples, Aleister Crowley, Information About Human Production, Angels, Demons, Lonley Human Beeings And Munks... It`s A Rather Unique Mix Setting Different Sounds Into A Music System And Maybe Create Some Ideas For The New Beat To Fill The Dancefloor With As Well As A Mix To Fill Your Head With. These Are Samples Collected To A Musical Handcraft To Design Certain Emotions. Enter Light///Exit Door!!! Mixed & Designed By: H.F. Jacket

music.title: Irama Gema Discography
music.content: From out of the Om Pharaoh Records universe, Irama Gema ( Malay for Echo Rhythm) initially began as an experimental collaboration hailing from Southern Ontario ( Canada ) and features a member from Ov Moi Omm . After the first release (“ Experiment I” ), Irama Gema has continued on as a project exploring ethnic electronic experimental soundscapes. " In brief, if you could look down from the moon, as Menippus once did, and see the innumerable broils of mortals, you would think you were looking at a great cloud of flies or gnats quarreling among themselves, warring, plotting, plundering, playing, frisking, being born, declining, dying. It is downright incredible what tumults, what tragedies can be stirred up by such a tiny creature, so frail and short-lived ". - Desiderius Erasmus “ Insults are the arguments employed by those who are in the wrong “. - Jean-Jacques Rousseau Discography 2013 - Experiment I 2014 - Experiment II 2015 - Experiment III 2015 - Experiment IV 2016 - Experiment V 2017 – Anthology ( compilation ) 2018 - Non-Sequitur Analysis Ep 2020 - Yellow Omm / Irama Gema Split Ep 2020 – Ep ( tracks from split with Yellow Omm ) 2022 - Experiment VI
